snippet: The surprisingly big increase in inflation fueled expectations that the Bank of England may start raising interest rates soon.
abstract: British pound spikes near six-year high against the dollar after surprisingly big increase in inflation fueled speculation that Bank of England may start raising interest rates soon.
lead_paragraph: The surprisingly big increase in inflation fueled expectations that the Bank of England may start raising interest rates soon.

headline.main: British Pound Jumps Near Six-Year High Against Dollar
headline.print_headline: British Pound Jumps Near Six-Year High Against Dollar
